---
slug: /154
title: "This Week In React #154: Server Components, Remix, Next.js, Redwood, Million, Lucia, ElementRef, Partially Controlled, SVG Sprites, NextUI, Storybook, Hermes, require.context..."
authors: [slorber]
date: 08-01-2023
image: /img/TWIR_POST.png
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64
大家好！

segments.source_content: Once again this week, we've got some great React articles, especially on Server Components!

translations.zh-hant: 本週我們再次帶來精彩的 React 文章，尤其是關於伺服器元件的內容！

segments.source_content: Last week, I asked whether you preferred direct links or links to Twitter. Your answer was unanimous: **direct links**. On top of that, the Twitter/X experience has been degraded for anonymous users who can no longer see the discussions. So I'll try to avoid Twitter links, with a few exceptions for which I'll use the 🐦 emoji.

translations.zh-hant: 上週我詢問大家偏好直接連結還是 Twitter 連結，答案非常一致：**直接連結**。此外，Twitter/X 的匿名用戶體驗已惡化，無法查看討論內容。因此我將盡量避免 Twitter 連結，少數例外情況會使用 🐦 表情符號標示。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_28a64196

segments.source_content: **💡 [Check this newsletter on Twitter](https://slo.im/thread) - visual format 🎨**

translations.zh-hant: **💡 [在 Twitter 上查看本期通訊](https://slo.im/thread) - 視覺化格式 🎨**
@@untranslatable_placeholder_0271a665
@@untranslatable_placeholder_b7a64917
## 💸 贊助商 {#sponsor1}
[![Frontendmasters](/emails/issues/151/frontendmasters.png)](https://frontendmasters.com/courses/enterprise-ui-dev/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_content=uidev)
**[企業級 UI 開發（使用 React）：測試與程式碼品質](https://frontendmasters.com/courses/enterprise-ui-dev/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=thisweekinreact&utm_content=uidev)**

segments.source_content: Managing or migrating large apps and codebases? This video course covers what you need to know to scale efficiently whilst maintaining code quality. Covers unit testing, CI pipelines, mocking, code coverage, and more.

translations.zh-hant: 正在管理或遷移大型應用程式和程式碼庫？本影片課程涵蓋高效擴展同時保持程式碼品質的關鍵知識，包括單元測試、CI 流程、模擬測試、程式碼覆蓋率等內容。
## ⚛️ React {#react}
[![深入理解 React 伺服器元件](/emails/issues/154/understandingrsc.jpg)](https://vercel.com/blog/understanding-react-server-components)
[**深入理解 React 伺服器元件**](https://vercel.com/blog/understanding-react-server-components)

segments.source_content: New Vercel article that gives a good overview of React Server Components, their implementation in Next.js, why they exist, when to use them and their limitations. Also covers various related topics: Server Actions, code-splitting, caching, suspense, selective hydration...

translations.zh-hant: Vercel 新發布的文章全面解析 React 伺服器元件，包含其在 Next.js 的實現原理、存在意義、適用場景與限制。同時涵蓋相關主題：伺服器操作、程式碼分割、快取機制、Suspense 及選擇性水合等技術。

segments.source_content: [![Everything I wish I knew before moving 50,000 lines of code to React Server Components](/emails/issues/154/everythingrsc.jpg)](https://www.mux.com/blog/what-are-react-server-components)

translations.zh-hant: [![遷移 50,000 行程式碼至 React 伺服器元件前我希望知道的事](/emails/issues/154/everythingrsc.jpg)](https://www.mux.com/blog/what-are-react-server-components)

segments.source_content: [**Everything I wish I knew before moving 50,000 lines of code to React Server Components**](https://www.mux.com/blog/what-are-react-server-components)

translations.zh-hant: [**遷移 50,000 行程式碼至 React 伺服器元件前我希望知道的事**](https://www.mux.com/blog/what-are-react-server-components)

segments.source_content: Awesome article on RSCs! Feedback that details the 3 main challenges encountered during the adoption at Mux: no CSS-in-JS, no React Context, and additional complexity. Also provides answers to many questions and a strategy for adopting RSCs incrementally.

translations.zh-hant: 關於 RSC 的深度好文！詳細記錄 Mux 公司在採用過程中遇到的三大挑戰：CSS-in-JS 不可用、React Context 限制以及複雜度提升。同時解答諸多關鍵問題，並提供漸進式採用 RSC 的實施策略。

segments.source_content:
- 👀 [React Working Group - List of libraries that support React Server Components](https://github.com/reactwg/server-components/discussions/6)
- 🐦 [React devs, it's time to start using `Array.prototype.with()`](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1686059338647957509)
- 📜 [Speeding up the dbt™ docs by 20x with React Server Components](https://dagster.io/blog/dbt-docs-on-react): feedback on a POC migration of an Angular 1 app to Next.js App Router and React Server Components. Very significant gains reported in terms of loading time, memory consumption, CPU blocking.
- 📜 [Shopify’s platform is the Web platform](https://shopify.engineering/shopifys-platform-is-the-web-platform): Shopify now recommends Remix for creating "Admin Apps", which run in an iframe and communicate with the parent app via an "App Bridge" based on `postMessage()`. An interesting frontend/React architecture for those building a platform that need decoupling.
- 📜 [Partially Controlled Components: A Declarative Design Pattern in React](https://www.jameskerr.blog/posts/partially-controlled-react-components/): introduces a new term/concept to describe components capable of offering both controlled/uncontrolled state on demand, with granularity applicable to the whole state, or a slice of it.
- 📜 [Use svg sprite icons in React](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/svg-icons): explains how to use SVG sprites (more optimised than React SVG components) in a Remix context with a codegen step.
- 📜 [Strongly Type useRef with ElementRef](https://www.totaltypescript.com/strongly-type-useref-with-elementref): TIL about the `ElementRef` TypeScript type, which is used to obtain the type of a React ref from any component, quite similarly to how `ComponentProps` works.
- 📜 [10 Essential React Performance Optimization Techniques for Faster Web Applications](https://techreactlearning.blogspot.com/2023/07/10-essential-react-performance.html)
- 📜 [Remix Error Handling Essentials](https://otiv.dev/blog/essential-remix-error-handling)
- 📦 [Lucia v2.0](https://lucia-auth.com/blog/lucia-2): Lucia is a TypeScript authentication library gaining momentum recently. Including Next.js and Remix integrations.
- 📦 [Million.js Automatic Mode beta](https://million.dev/docs/automatic): now analyses your React code and automatically optimises it with Million.js!
- 📦 [Redwood v6](https://github.com/redwoodjs/redwood/releases/tag/v6.0.0): new stable release with Vite, Prisma 5, Storybook 7, Suspense Router... Prepares the ground for the introduction of streaming support and React Server components.
- 📦 [NextUI Version 2.0](https://nextui.org/blog/nextui-v2)
- 📦 [Joi UI beta - design-agnostic lib from the MUI team](https://mui.com/joy-ui/getting-started/)
- 📦 [Storybook 7.2](https://storybook.js.org/blog/july-2023-update/)
- 📦 [Auto-Form - Automatically creates a @shadcn/ui form based on a zod schema](https://github.com/vantezzen/auto-form)
- 📦 [Framer Motion 10.5 - inView API](https://www.framer.com/motion/in-view/)
- 📦 [Zustand 4.4](https://github.com/pmndrs/zustand/releases/tag/v4.4.0)
- 🎥 [Must Know App Router Secret: Promises For Props](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ViVa5JPGrf4)
- 🎙️ [This Month in React – July 2023](https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/reactiflux/episodes/This-Month-in-React--July-2023-e27ijk5)

translations.zh-hant:
- 👀 [React 工作小組 - 支援 React Server Components 的函式庫清單](https://github.com/reactwg/server-components/discussions/6)
- 🐦 [React 開發者，是時候開始使用 `Array.prototype.with()` 了](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1686059338647957509)
- 📜 [使用 React Server Components 將 dbt™ 文件速度提升 20 倍](https://dagster.io/blog/dbt-docs-on-react)：關於將 Angular 1 應用程式遷移至 Next.js App Router 和 React Server Components 的概念驗證回饋。在載入時間、記憶體消耗和 CPU 阻塞方面報告了非常顯著的增益。
- 📜 [Shopify 的平台就是 Web 平台](https://shopify.engineering/shopifys-platform-is-the-web-platform)：Shopify 現在推薦使用 Remix 建立「管理應用程式」，這些應用程式在 iframe 中執行，並透過基於 `postMessage()` 的「應用程式橋接器」與父應用程式通訊。對於需要解耦的平台建構者來說，這是個有趣的前端/React 架構。
- 📜 [部分受控元件：React 中的宣告式設計模式](https://www.jameskerr.blog/posts/partially-controlled-react-components/)：介紹新術語/概念，描述能夠按需提供受控/非受控狀態的元件，其細粒度可應用於整個狀態或部分狀態。
- 📜 [在 React 中使用 SVG 精靈圖示](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/svg-icons)：說明如何在 Remix 環境中透過代碼生成步驟使用 SVG 精靈（比 React SVG 元件更優化）。
- 📜 [使用 ElementRef 強型別化 useRef](https://www.totaltypescript.com/strongly-type-useref-with-elementref)：介紹 TypeScript 的 `ElementRef` 類型，用於從任何元件取得 React ref 的類型，類似 `ComponentProps` 的運作方式。
- 📜 [10 個提升網頁應用速度的 React 效能優化技巧](https://techreactlearning.blogspot.com/2023/07/10-essential-react-performance.html)
- 📜 [Remix 錯誤處理精要](https://otiv.dev/blog/essential-remix-error-handling)
- 📦 [Lucia v2.0](https://lucia-auth.com/blog/lucia-2)：近期勢頭強勁的 TypeScript 身份驗證函式庫，包含 Next.js 和 Remix 整合。
- 📦 [Million.js 自動模式測試版](https://million.dev/docs/automatic)：現在會分析 React 代碼並自動使用 Million.js 進行優化！
- 📦 [Redwood v6](https://github.com/redwoodjs/redwood/releases/tag/v6.0.0)：新穩定版本包含 Vite、Prisma 5、Storybook 7、Suspense Router... 為串流支援和 React Server Components 奠定基礎。
- 📦 [NextUI 2.0 版](https://nextui.org/blog/nextui-v2)
- 📦 [Joi UI 測試版 - MUI 團隊的設計無關函式庫](https://mui.com/joy-ui/getting-started/)
- 📦 [Storybook 7.2](https://storybook.js.org/blog/july-2023-update/)
- 📦 [Auto-Form - 基於 zod 架構自動建立 @shadcn/ui 表單](https://github.com/vantezzen/auto-form)
- 📦 [Framer Motion 10.5 - inView API](https://www.framer.com/motion/in-view/)
- 📦 [Zustand 4.4](https://github.com/pmndrs/zustand/releases/tag/v4.4.0)
- 🎥 [必須了解的 App Router 秘密：使用 Promise 傳遞 Props](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ViVa5JPGrf4)
- 🎙️ [本月 React 動態 – 2023 年 7 月](https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/reactiflux/episodes/This-Month-in-React--July-2023-e27ijk5)
@@untranslatable_placeholder_091b48eb
## 💸 贊助商 {#sponsor2}
[![CoderPad：在共同工作之前先一起編寫程式](/emails/issues/154/coderpad.png)](https://coderpad.io/?utm_medium=3pmedia&utm_source=ThisWeekInReact&utm_campaign=23-Q3-3PMedia-ThisWeekInReact-ACQ-All-Global-Newsletter)
[**CoderPad：在共同工作前先一起編碼**](https://coderpad.io/?utm_medium=3pmedia&utm_source=ThisWeekInReact&utm_campaign=23-Q3-3PMedia-ThisWeekInReact-ACQ-All-Global-Newsletter)

segments.source_content: Hiring front-end developers is hard. 😩 But 4,000+ engineering teams — including at Netflix, Spotify and LinkedIn — have found a better way! 🤠 Skip the algorithm interviews and **run front-end interviews in a fully customizable and collaborative IDE** - where you can:

translations.zh-hant: 招募前端開發者很困難。😩 但已有超過 4,000 個工程團隊 —— 包括 Netflix、Spotify 和 LinkedIn —— 找到了更好的方法！🤠 跳過演算法面試，**在完全可自訂且協作的 IDE 中進行前端面試** —— 您可在此：

segments.source_content:
- drag and drop a React (and Angular or Vue) repo
- add packages with npm install
- let candidates use ChatGPT live in the interview
- watch & share code playback after the interview

translations.zh-hant:
- 拖放 React（以及 Angular 或 Vue）程式庫
- 透過 npm install 安裝套件
- 允許候選人在面試中即時使用 ChatGPT
- 在面試後觀看並分享程式碼重播

segments.source_content: Use CoderPad to run fast, fair and real coding interviews that candidates and interviewers trust. [Sign up for free today & hire with confidence](https://coderpad.io/?utm_medium=3pmedia&utm_source=ThisWeekInReact&utm_campaign=23-Q3-3PMedia-ThisWeekInReact-ACQ-All-Global-Newsletter).

translations.zh-hant: 使用 CoderPad 進行快速、公平且真實的編碼面試，讓候選人和面試官都信任。[立即免費註冊，充滿信心地招募](https://coderpad.io/?utm_medium=3pmedia&utm_source=ThisWeekInReact&utm_campaign=23-Q3-3PMedia-ThisWeekInReact-ACQ-All-Global-Newsletter)。
## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

segments.source_content: [![Measure Hermes engine performance in React Native with Flashlight](/emails/issues/154/hermes.jpg)](https://www.bam.tech/article/measure-hermes-engine-performance-in-react-native-with-flashlight)

translations.zh-hant: [![在 React Native 中使用 Flashlight 測量 Hermes 引擎效能](/emails/issues/154/hermes.jpg)](https://www.bam.tech/article/measure-hermes-engine-performance-in-react-native-with-flashlight)

segments.source_content: [**Measure Hermes engine performance in React Native with Flashlight**](https://www.bam.tech/article/measure-hermes-engine-performance-in-react-native-with-flashlight)

translations.zh-hant: [**在 React Native 中使用 Flashlight 測量 Hermes 引擎效能**](https://www.bam.tech/article/measure-hermes-engine-performance-in-react-native-with-flashlight)

segments.source_content: The developers at BAM benchmarked the impact of the Hermes runtime on the app start-up time and memory consumption of a React-Native Android app using their [Flashlight](https://github.com/bamlab/flashlight) performance tool. For those who were still in doubt, Hermes clearly outperforms JSC.

translations.zh-hant: BAM 的開發者使用其效能工具 [Flashlight](https://github.com/bamlab/flashlight) 對 Hermes 運行時在 React-Native Android 應用程式的啟動時間和記憶體消耗的影響進行了基準測試。對於仍有疑慮者，Hermes 明顯優於 JSC。

segments.source_content:
- 🐦 [Apple Store - 1/5 of top 100 Sports apps use React-Native](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1684579413688750082)
- 🐦 [React-Native now has end-2-end tests](https://twitter.com/SzymonRybczak/status/1684870142839160832): great news for React-Native release process and QA, the official RNTester app is now tested with Appium and WebDriver.
- 📜 [Dynamic imports supported in react native](https://dev.to/dannyhw/dynamic-imports-supported-in-react-native-273j): the Webpack feature `require.context` (used to import a folder of modules dynamically) has been ported to Metro for the needs of Expo Router. This allows [Storybook React-Native 6.5.5](https://github.com/storybookjs/react-native/releases/tag/v6.5.5) to create an index of stories without a codegen step (in preview), and opens up other interesting possibilities.
- 📜 [Apple - List of APIs that require declared reasons now available](https://developer.apple.com/news/?id=z6fu1dcu): React-Native iOS developers need to prepare for new constraints.
- 📦 [VisionCamera 3.0.0-rc.4](https://github.com/mrousavy/react-native-vision-camera/releases/tag/v3.0.0-rc.4): a number of significant changes in this RC, in preparation for the expected arrival of v3.
- 🎥 [How to make a bottom sheet with React Native Reanimated](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lYYiuXcTnnE)

translations.zh-hant:
- 🐦 [Apple Store - 前 100 名運動類應用中有五分之一使用 React-Native](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1684579413688750082)
- 🐦 [React-Native 現已具備端到端測試](https://twitter.com/SzymonRybczak/status/1684870142839160832)：對 React-Native 發布流程和品質保證來說是個好消息，官方 RNTester 應用現已使用 Appium 和 WebDriver 進行測試。
- 📜 [React Native 支援動態導入](https://dev.to/dannyhw/dynamic-imports-supported-in-react-native-273j)：為滿足 Expo Router 需求，Webpack 的 `require.context` 功能（用於動態導入模組資料夾）已被移植到 Metro。這使得 [Storybook React-Native 6.5.5](https://github.com/storybookjs/react-native/releases/tag/v6.5.5) 可在預覽模式下無需程式碼生成步驟建立故事索引，並開啟其他可能性。
- 📜 [Apple - 需聲明使用理由的 API 列表現已提供](https://developer.apple.com/news/?id=z6fu1dcu)：React-Native iOS 開發者需為新限制做好準備。
- 📦 [VisionCamera 3.0.0-rc.4](https://github.com/mrousavy/react-native-vision-camera/releases/tag/v3.0.0-rc.4)：此 RC 版包含多項重大變更，為預期的 v3 正式版做準備。
- 🎥 [如何使用 React Native Reanimated 製作底部工作表](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lYYiuXcTnnE)
## 🧑‍💻 職缺 {#jobs}
🧑‍💼 [**Passionfroot - 資深全端工程師 (Remix) - €160k+，柏林/遠端**](https://passionfroot.recruitee.com/o/senior-fullstack-engineer)

segments.source_content: Passionfroot's mission is to empower the independent businesses of tomorrow via YouTube, Podcasts, Social Media, and Newsletters. Join us in building a tool that will empower creators globally to build scalable, sustainable businesses.

translations.zh-hant: Passionfroot 的使命是透過 YouTube、Podcast、社交媒體和新聞通訊賦能未來的獨立企業。加入我們，共同打造能讓全球創作者建立可擴展、可持續業務的工具。

segments.source_content: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - Senior React Native Developer - Fully Remote, PLN 21-32k net on B2B, monthly**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)

translations.zh-hant: 🧑‍💼 [**Callstack - 高級 React Native 開發人員 - 全遠端，B2B 合約月薪淨額 PLN 21-32k**](https://www.callstack.com/senior-react-native-developer)

segments.source_content: Do you want to work on the world's most used apps? Would you like to co-create the React Native technology? Join the Callstack team of React & React Native leaders. Check our website for more details. We are looking forward to seeing your application - show us what you've got!

translations.zh-hant: 您是否想開發全球最多人使用的應用程式？是否希望共同打造 React Native 技術？加入 Callstack 的 React & React Native 領導者團隊。詳情請參閱官網。我們期待您的申請 — 展現您的實力吧！
🧑‍💼 [**G2i - 100% 遠端 React Native 職缺**](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i/status/1563204813881425926?s=20&t=ArRLC77BpRwXXCdx8fnUqw)

segments.source_content: We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is ~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.

translations.zh-hant: 我們有多個專注 React Native 的開發職缺開放！薪資約 160k 美元外加 10% 獎金。需具備 RN 實際生產經驗且位於美國。私訊 [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) 了解詳情，別忘了提及 This Week in React。
💡 [如何發布職缺？](https://thisweekinreact.com/sponsor)

## 🤭 趣味 {#fun}
[![alt](/emails/issues/154/meme.jpg)](https://twitter.com/fireship_dev/status/1684324664699674625)
再見！👋
